sequenceDiagram title Create From External Intermediate DID Document participant Controller participant BTC1Create participant Encode as Identifier Encoding participant Canonicalize as Canonicalize & Hash note over Controller, Canonicalize: Offline — no Bitcoin network interaction Controller->>BTC1Create: CreateExternal(Infra_LoadBalancer) BTC1Create->>BTC1Create: idType="external"
version=1
network="bitcoin" BTC1Create->>Canonicalize: CanonicalizeAndHash(Infra_WorkerNode) Canonicalize-->>BTC1Create: genesisBytes BTC1Create->>Encode: Encode(Infra_LoadBalancer) Encode-->>BTC1Create: id BTC1Create->>BTC1Create: initialDocument = copy(Infra_WorkerNode)
Replace all did:btc1:xxxx... with id BTC1Create-->>Controller: {Infra_RedisCache} Note right of BTC1Create: Optionally, store canonicalBytes on IPFS as CID.
